subject: Boxing
Decisions and Verdicts
Birthdays
lead_paragraph: It has been almost a quarter century since he last fought in the ring, and his body endures the effects of Parkinson’s disease. But as he turns 65, Muhammad Ali remains the people’s heavyweight champion.
snippet: It has been almost a quarter century since he last fought in the ring, and his body endures the effects of Parkinson’s disease. But as he turns 65, Muhammad Ali remains the people’s heavyweight champion.
